subject: Re: [junit] Is there a way to embed Junit Swing UI TestRunner into other frame/windows?
msgSnippet: ... Almost certainly. ... What happened when you tried to do it? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
Ritesh wrote:

> Is there a way to embed Junit Swing UI TestRunner into other
> frame/windows?

Almost certainly.

> I want to be able to integrate the Swing UI Test Runner screen into
> my existing Frame.

What happened when you tried to do it?
